snippet.title: Indie Elevator Pitch (Projected Dreams, Necro Story, Haunted Paws, SwordAI) - FGS Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
The Indie Elevator Pitch submission platform launched during this year's Future Games Show Summer Showcase to help spotlight up-and-coming indie games. During our Gamescom show, we picked out four of the best pitches we've received to share with the world. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow
#projecteddreams #necrostory #hauntedpaws #swordai 
#FutureGamesShow #FGS
